title: Apple sauce pork chops
ingredients: ['1 package of 4 pork chops (extra fat removed)', '1 teaspoon of olive oil', '1 200g jar of unsweeetened apple sauce', '250ml of chicken stock', '1 teaspoon chilli powder (or to taste)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon nutmeg', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 large bay leaf']
